page.title: 13COMPREHENSIVE EDUCATION
page.content: Bellshill Academy is one of two secondary schools in the Bellahill area offering a comprehensive education system. The other is Cardinal Newmn high School for the children of Roman catholic families. Pupils come to the Academy from the neighbourhood at the age of 11+. Their first two years in the Academy has a common course. All pupils at this stage study English, History, Geography, Mathematics, French, Science,Classical Studies, technical Subjects, Home Economics, Art, Music, Religious Education, and Physical Education. Those in most need of extra help in numeracy and literacy arre assisted by the Remedial Department. At the end of the Second Year the pupils choose the subjects they will study to Ordinary Grade and to Higher Grade And Sixth year Study level.
